thought: To craft a mossy_cobblestone, I need to place 1 cobblestone and 1 vine side by side in the crafting table. I will start by moving the vine from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a mossy_cobblestone, I need to place 1 cobblestone and 1 vine side by side in the crafting table. The cobblestone is at slot 22, so I will move it to slot 2 which is adjacent to the vine.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1
